timeline.message: Add allowAutoTopicCreation option to policies and CLI
Refactor to allow partitioned topics, added tests
Add license to new pulsar-common files
Remove null check that could cause silent failure
Switch back to synchronous policy retreival

timeline.bodyText: It's better to leverage with AsyncResponse, you can take a look https://github.com/apache/pulsar/blob/master/pulsar-broker/src/main/java/org/apache/pulsar/broker/admin/v2/PersistentTopics.java#L198.
timeline.author: codelipenghui
timeline.diffHunk:

         internalModifyDeduplication(enableDeduplication);
     }
 
+    @POST
+    @Path("/{tenant}/{namespace}/allowAutoTopicCreationOverride")
+    @ApiOperation(value = "Override broker's allowAutoTopicCreation setting for a namespace")
+    @ApiResponses(value = { @ApiResponse(code = 403, message = "Don't have admin permission"),
+            @ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Tenant or cluster or namespace doesn't exist"),
+            @ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Invalid autoTopicCreation override") })
+    public void setAllowAutoTopicCreationOverride(@PathParam("tenant") String tenant, @PathParam("namespace") String namespace,

timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.bodyText: We'd better complete the asyncResponse when there are RunTimeException occurs. Otherwise, the client just can get a 500 response but can't get any error messages.
timeline.author: codelipenghui
codelipenghui

timeline.message: Add clause to resume async response on exceptions
